subject: SIMSONN PC USB 7+R H Simulator Gear Shifter
description_text:
hi i was wondering if you can adjust the shifter stiffness because overtime
using it since i bought the shifter it feels easier to shift with.

Thankyou, John

conversations.body_text: Hi John L Romenick,  Please provide your order number, and we will check it and offer you a solution.

702-6072841-3662657 that's the order number off of Amazon

On Sat, Aug 9, 2025, 11:56 a.m. service@simsonn.com
Hi John L Romenick,    I have checked the Amazon order. Since it is early Sunday morning, I will look into it on Monday and get back to you.
